Description: Ring foot and body sherd of large Egyptian black ware bowl; dull grey Nile silt fabric core sandwiched between light reddish brown inner margins and dark brown outer margins, with mica inclusions; black slip on interior and exterior; wide incised band on interior delineating tondo (pseudo-fishplate); inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 617)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (IC.072)
